ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And tell them about the guests of Ibrahim.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Inform them about the matter of Abraham's guests.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And tell them about Abraham's guests.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Tell them about the guests of Abraham
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And inform them of Ibrahim’s guests.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And tell them about the guests (i.e., the angels) of Ibrahim.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And inform them of the guests of Ibrahim:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And tell them of the guests of Abraham,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And tell them of Abraham's guests,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And declare thou unto them of Ibrahim's guests.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And inform them about the guests of Abraham,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Tell them about the guests of Abraham.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And tell them about the guests (the angels) of Ibrahim (Abraham).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And inform them of the guests of Abraham.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And inform them about the guests of Abraham,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:51] And tell them of the guests of Abraham, that is, the angels — there were twelve, ten or three of them, among them Gabriel;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And tell them of Abraham's guests) the Archangel Gabriel and the twelve angels who accompanied him.
